Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Gangon wakes up. He had fallen asleep durring his slow death. He looks to s=
ee if anyone is in the cell next to his. No BrightBlade? She must have been=
 dead. He leaned back and waited. 5 days? How was he alive? Someone must ha=
te him by liking him up there in the Matrix. He was always told that death =
could come easily. The old man who told him must have been crazy or stupid,=
 considering this. He had seen others die so easily. Why was a weak bot lik=
e him living this long? Why was the universe always against him! Thousands =
of questions he thought about before falling asleep again...
